To clarify the guy here confesses to the girl and then she asks him if he wants her for her body or for her personality. The guy thinks that of course he wants her body but he can't admit it so he say's he wants her for who she is not her body. Then she say's she agree's to it but since he wants her for who she is then she wants to add some conditions so he can prove he's not after her body. Them being as mentioned by taiki39 that they will date for a few years and then get married but until then no sex. He also has to allow her to sleep around, she will also record or take pictures of her sexual exploits and then send it to him or show / tell him and he has to watch / listen to it all. Eventually he cracks and pushes her down upon which she tells him their no longer a couple of lovers anymore. But she also admits it was her plan all along to break him down / corrupt him.

Then the last few pages are from my understanding her telling him to paint over all the sex she's had and work hard to get her pregnant while he just keeps nutting into her until he's lost count of how many times he's cummed but it still isn't enough to satisfy her. Then I believe the last thing she say's is to tell him to work hard from now on to overwrite all the other men she's slept with. So it's kinda left up in the air where it will go from here but it would seem her plan all along was to create a sex friend thats crazy about her that she will show videos of her having sex with others to drive the person into trying to breed her like crazy or something so to get her.
